trade, commerce, marketing, business law, production management and finance. Not without regret he did not 
follow this training longer because he found an excellent opportunity in the meantime.

2015  to date  Advens  
 
Jan 2018 to date

Candidate Name:  Julien Vallée  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
  
Location:    Paris, France  
  
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
Degree, Signal Processing and Telecommunications – Eseo, School of Engineering (1997 - 2003)  
 
Free Auditor , Business Management  – Université Panthéon Sorbonne , Paris I  (2003)  
- Followed the business manag ement training as a free auditor for 6 months.  Studied accounting, international 
trade, commerce, marketing, business law, production management and finance. Not without regret he did not 
follow this training longer because he found an excellent opportunity in the meantime.  
 
Languages:  
French (Mother tongue)  
English (Fluent)  
   
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
2015  to date  Advens  
 
Jan 2018 to date  
Position: SOC Senior Specialist  
Dedicated  to the DIRISI market for SOC activities and hardening of systems of the Ministry of the French  Army. 
Trained in regulations on the French Military Programming Law and Vital French organization s. 
Responsibilities :  
• Understand the security issues in r elation to cyber risks  
• Analyze architectures  
• Identify or imagine best way of threat detection,  
• Manage multi -skill teams ( pen testers , analysts, technical  teams, and auditors ) 
• Follow the different phases of the projects, in a supervisory role, or in a co ntributor role,  
• Contribute to innovation and development of detection technics.  
 
Training followed :  
• Deep Knowledge in MITRE ATT&CK  
• Advanced Training on SPLUNK  
• Training in Securing Industrial Networks  
• Training in Deep Packet Inspection   
• Offensive Security Traini ng: Cracking the perimeter CTP  
• Deceptive Security Training  
• Nessus Scanner Training  
 
2018 to date  
Position: First Level Manager and Technical  Manager , CSIRT   
In the first level manager team, they organize this activity in Advens.  They  qualify customer requests, recruit the 
incident response team in their internal skills , and devise the incident response strategies.  
 In addition to follow -up and coordination activities with customer s teams, he enjoys investigat ing on site with the 
incident response team.  
 
Certifications Passed : 
• Cybereason Certified Technical Specialist  
• Cybereason Certified Security Expert  
• Cybereason Certified Threat Hunter  
 
Training Followed:  
• ENISA European Union Agency for Cybersecur ity 
• SANS - 401 Security Essential  
• SANS - 503 Intrusion Detection  
• SANS - 508 Advanced Incident Response and Threat Hunting  
• SANS - 660 Advanced Penetration Testing, Exploit Writing and Ethical  
• Hacking  
 
2017 – 2018  
Position: SOC Solution Integration Manager  
He was in charge of customer SOC  integration s: Sec archi tecture, Sec Log and SOC exploitation.  
 
Team leader of three experts in order to cover perimeter. As part of a team specialising in responding to security 
incidents (CSIRT), he supported the teams in optimising the operational security policy on their customer s' 
infrastructures. He intervened for the Advens SOC and put his expertise to work for the clients and internal teams. 
He was involved in the configuration of the technologies managed and supervised by their SOC.  
 
Responsibilities:  
• Supporting his teams in the deployment of mySoc services to our client s and a ssisting in the qualification and 
resolution of security incidents  
• Maintain or upgrade information system architectures and configurations to adapt them to monitoring plans  
• Perform configuration and logging policy reviews aligned with SOC Risk analysis  
• Define the prerequisites for the deployment of mySoc services as well as the technical integration procedures,  
• Participate in integrations and provide support to the o perating teams.(like making full malware analysis of 
NotPetya and Wannacry)  
• Proactive technology watch - Model assembly for proof of concept  
 
Self-Courses  Followed :  
• Training Industrial Network Security  
• Training SANS 401 Security Essentials  
• Training SANS 50 3 Intrusion Detection  
• Training SANS 508 Advanced Incident Response Training  
• Training Certified Ethical Hacker  
• Training Offensive 101  
• Training SIEM (QRadar, SPLUNK, ALIEN VAULT an

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
